```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## import data

```{r}
dat <- read_csv("../output/height_data_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
tmbh <- dat %>%
  filter(str_detect(pop, "TM2|BH"))
```

```{r}
tmbh %>% ggplot(aes(x=survey_date, y=height_cm, col=pop)) +
  geom_line(aes(group=plantID), alpha=.3) +
  geom_smooth(se=FALSE)
```
